casebody.data:
GALLIGAN, Respondent, v. METROPOLITAN ST. RY. CO., Appellant. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

October 29, 1900.) Action by John F. Galligan against' the-Metropolitan Street-Railway Company. From, a judgment in favor of plaintiff, defendant appeals. Affirmed. Henry A. Robinson, for appellant. Philip J. Britt, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
